name: Street Soccer 2016: Soccer stars league for legend players of world by BULKY SPORTS [Premium]
name_original: Street Soccer 2016: Soccer stars league for legend players of world by BULKY SPORTS [Premium]
description:
******************************************************
[Unlimited virtual currency, Unlock anything]
******************************************************


Street Soccer 2016 is fun and fast paced soccer game for iOS. Download and enjoy the best free soccer game experience on your device.

Kick-off from the center of the soccer field, dribble your way to the opponent's goal, and kick the ball in for a score. From realistic passes to powerful shots, this football game has it all. This game will have you hooked for many matches, as you watch your team make it to the winner cup finals…!!! So get ready from the point the whistle blows off for kick off, this is one soccer game you'll want to be with!

With street soccer 2016 game you can enjoy multiple game modes i.e. Training, Quick Game, Knockout and Tournament.

Street Soccer 2016 is one of the best soccer game with amazing 3D players and immersive sound. Try your skills as a striker, runs, dribbles, shoot and be a soccer star! The realistic graphics and sound effects of soccer player, court, arena will make match come to life on your screen during games.

There is a quick play mode where you just have to pick your team and opponent team and enjoy the real simulation of this soccer gam. You can also play tournament with different teams throughout semi final and final.

-------------------------
Game Controls:
-------------------------
"Pass button" for pass and tackle.
"Kick button" for shoot the ball.
"Direction Key" to control the movement of the player.

-------------------------
Game Features:
-------------------------

-Top 30 soccer 2016 playing nations are added.
-Smoother and more realistic and optimized graphics for both players and perfect street soccer arena.
-cool 3d sounds.
-Smooth animations with 60 frames per second
-Simple yet powerful touch controls with timing control.
-Compete with your friends with the integrated world ranking leader board
 -Street Soccer 2016 game contains Pure soccer action!
